âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ A pie menu implemented in Godot Engine â€¢ Uses a configuration file (~/.config/godot-pie/config.cfg) to define menu items and actions â€¢ Launches applications via a daemon (godot-pie-daemon.py) that executes specified commands â€¢ Supports submenus and custom icons â€¢ Automatic click on nearest button for faster launching
ðŸ“– Summary: This Godot Engine project creates a pie menu for application launching. It's configured via a config file specifying applications and their associated commands, and uses a daemon for execution. The menu features automatic selection of the nearest button for enhanced speed.
